name: Golf N Rage
description:
Love sport games? Eager to release your stress? Channel all of your golfing rage and whack some golf balls in this driving range/anger management simulator. Power up your golfer by purchasing new clubs that unlock new levels of RAGE! Slam down the ball while it’s in the air to target flags and hit obstacles on the ground. Sinking your shots will earn you bonus rewards and create great replays to share with your friends. Show off your true golf skills with challenging shots to make and trophies to complete. Unleashing your true power will allow you to launch the ball unbelievable distances!

….And don’t forget to hit the range picker!

Features:
- Over 20 unlockable golf clubs
- 7 levels of RAGE
- Trophies with unlockable rewards
- Daily rewards
- Beat everyone on the Leaderboards!

Thanks for Playing! RAGE ON!

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/bootjetgames/
